tests._comment0_: Test for VoiceXML markup. (Currently that is the same as SSML.)

VoiceXml.expected: x <break time="200ms"/> equals <break time="450ms"/> <prosody rate="+17%"> negative b plus or minus Square root of </prosody> <prosody rate="+35%"> b <prosody pitch="+17%"> squared </prosody> <break time="300ms"/> minus four times a times c </prosody> <prosody rate="+17%"> <break time="650ms"/> </prosody> divided by <prosody rate="-18%"> two times a </prosody> <break time="400ms"/>
